episodes.title: Mithraism: The Ancient Cult Hiding in Plain Sight
episodes.description:
Ancient gods, secret rituals, and a cult that may still shape the modern world.

In another eye-opening episode, Kofy sits down once again with researcher Dave L.C. to uncover the forgotten world of Mithraism—Rome’s elite mystery religion. 

Was it just a relic of the past, or is its legacy hiding in plain sight across the West today? 

From sun worship to symbols of power, this deep dive exposes the ancient blueprint that may still influence the institutions around us.
